Html:
All,

  While working with the latest Prism drop I noticed that the simple container that is used in the examples doesn't support dependency injection via the constructor like the Unity container did in the CAB for WPF.  Will future drops have some type of unitiy container and if so when might that be available?  Any help is much appreciated

Thanks

Hi,

 

The latest drop of Prism (vNext) contains the binaries for Unity in the LIB\Silverlight\Unity and LIB\Desktop\Unity folders. For an example, check the RemoteModuleLoading Quickstart that uses the UnityBootstrapper.

 

To get this drop, you must go here: http://www.codeplex.com/CompositeWPF/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=18184.

 

Hope it helps.
